name: Air Combat Arena
description: Air Combat Arena is an arcade-style flight combat game. In the game you can pilot various planes play against other players on various maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2G Hz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2G Hz Memory: 2 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
